languages.text: "Святость монастыря Движущей Силы была нарушена, но обеты Омниссии восторжествовали. В дарах Его да обретется истинная сила".
"The sanctity of the monastery of the Motive Force has been violated, but the vows of the Omnissiah have triumphed. In the gift of Technology do we find strength."
languages.original_text: "Святость монастыря Движущей Силы была нарушена, но обеты Омниссии восторжествовали. В дарах Его да обретется истинная сила".

traits.locale_text: "The sanctity of the monastery of the Motive Force has been violated, but the vows of the Omnissiah have triumphed. In His gifts do we find strength."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The sanctity of the monastery of the Motive Force has been violated, but the vows of the Omnissiah have triumphed. In His gifts do we find strength."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The sanctity of the monastery of the Motive Force has been violated, but the vows of the Omnissiah have triumphed. In His gifts do we find strength."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The sanctity of the monastery of the Motive Force has been violated, but the vows of the Omnissiah have triumphed. In His gifts do we find strength."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “神圣的源力修道院遭到了亵渎，但欧姆尼塞亚的誓言取得了最终的胜利。愿我们在祂的恩赐中寻得力量。”
languages.original_text: "The sanctity of the monastery of the Motive Force has been violated, but the vows of the Omnissiah have triumphed. In the gift of Technology do we find strength."

traits.locale_text: “神圣的原初动力修道院遭到了亵渎，但欧姆尼塞亚的誓言取得了最终的胜利。愿我们在祂的恩赐中寻得力量。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Le monastère de la Force Motrice a été profané, mais les vœux de l'Omnimessie ont triomphé. Le don de la technologie nous donne la force. »
languages.original_text: "The sanctity of the monastery of the Motive Force has been violated, but the vows of the Omnissiah have triumphed. In the gift of Technology do we find strength."

traits.locale_text: « Le monastère de la Force Motrice a été profané, mais les vœux de l'Omnimessie ont triomphé. Ses dons nous donnent la force. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die Heiligkeit des Klosters der Antriebskraft wurde verletzt, doch der Eid des Omnissiah hat triumphiert. In der Gabe der Technologie finden wir Stärke."
languages.original_text: "The sanctity of the monastery of the Motive Force has been violated, but the vows of the Omnissiah have triumphed. In the gift of Technology do we find strength."

traits.locale_text: "Die Heiligkeit des Klosters der Antriebskraft wurde verletzt, doch der Eid des Omnissiah hat triumphiert. In seinen Gaben finden wir Stärke."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「機会教団の修道院のサンクティティは侵されたが、万機神の誓いは勝利した。私たちはテクノロジーという賜物に力を見いだす」
languages.original_text: "The sanctity of the monastery of the Motive Force has been violated, but the vows of the Omnissiah have triumphed. In the gift of Technology do we find strength."

traits.locale_text: 「機会教団の修道院のサンクティティは侵されたが、万機神の誓いは勝利した。私たちは主の賜物に力を見いだす」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La santidad del monasterio de la Fuerza Motriz ha sido violada, pero los votos del Omnissiah han triunfado. Los dones de la tecnología son nuestra fuerza».
languages.original_text: "The sanctity of the monastery of the Motive Force has been violated, but the vows of the Omnissiah have triumphed. In the gift of Technology do we find strength."

traits.locale_text: «La santidad del monasterio de la Fuerza Motriz ha sido violada, pero los votos del Omnissiah han triunfado. Sus dones son nuestra fuerza».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "The sanctity of the monastery of the Motive Force has been violated, but the vows of the Omnissiah have triumphed. In the gift of Technology do we find strength."

languages.text: "Devinim Gücü manastırının mukaddesliği zedelense de Hermesih adına içilen antlar galip geldi. Teknolojinin lütfunda kuvvet buluruz."
languages.original_text: "The sanctity of the monastery of the Motive Force has been violated, but the vows of the Omnissiah have triumphed. In the gift of Technology do we find strength."

traits.locale_text: "Devinim Gücü manastırının mukaddesliği zedelense de Hermesih adına içilen antlar galip geldi. Teknoloji'nin lütfunda kuvvet buluruz."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
